import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Mail, Phone, MapPin, Send } from 'lucide-react'; import './Contact.css'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', organization: '', message: '', type: 'general' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Form submitted:', formData); // Handle form submission }; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (
